item.title: Shut up, Nazi.
item.description: I feel this is appropriate. Front page edit. Y'all, I am having a horrible day. My landlords have me so They are Jake Paul type people, and are running a slum situation. Found out they've not had a rental license since August 1st, and have failed their building inspection. Might have to move in the middle of winter while in Minnesota. They put me under so much stress that I had a seizure and felt kinda hard. So today sucks. However, I'm going to be making this picture into a poster once I get paid. So that will make me happy.

item.title: Basically becoming a monarchy
item.description: To become a politician you should have not only to have a full background check, it should be mandatory to work in a public facing job aka retail, server etc for at least a couple of years and have earned experience in a particular field. I would rather have Johnny the burger flipper that came from nothing, knows how to budget, how to treat people and has real life experience than the daughter/son of a precious politician or rich asshole that had never even seen the inside of a warehouse at a retail store and think that just because daddy/mommy were big shit they deserve the same. We have decided in most of the world that we would elect our representatives, then why the fuck are we going back to basically a monarchy with layers? Also politicians are supposed to be the servants of the people, so they shouldn't earn from politics more than the minimum wage. If the lower parts of your country can't afford housing and food (which I might add are both basic human rights) then you shouldn't either, you're doing a shit job. Is almost like you never played an RTS or a TBS. As for the rich, of you amassed a couple of millions, be it in savings or assets, anything above that should be directly sent back to the country to fund education, healthcare, safety and so on. I grew up extremely religious (in Europe not American) and was the knowledge that I got from religions that truly made me an atheist. At the end of the goddamn day we are all people, black, white, purple or green who gives a fuck. We should all the fighting for our right as a species, as humans, not as X country or Y group. Not blaming the foreigner next door that is working 80 hours a week to help their family back home, or the homeless guy on the street that lost everything because some asshole decided that rent should be 1000% more because they added a supermarket 3 km away, or the person with a different religion that celebrated they holidays with their friends in a respectful manner, or the homosexual downstairs that just found the love of their life. I've heard this a lot but I don't see it repeated enough. They go us fighting a religious/colour/country/gender/sexuality war so we don't fight a class war. Stop with the "we can't do anything" rhetoric, stop with the "there's no alternative", there's always an alternative, humans have been doing it for millennium. Read history, learn from the past, that's what truly radicalises people, the desire not to repeat the continually repeated mistakes of the past because we as a species decide that it's better to just forget the past. Fuck the rich and ruling classes, fuck those that think they are above the rest of us because of birth or status. We all bleed red, take away the skin and labels we are all just humans. And above all fuck those that grow in hate and racism, realise it and decide to continue that path because it will elevate them to some BS status.

item.title: Trump meeting with white supremacist
item.description: Trump's seen meeting with white supremacists. Why aren't we talking about this shit? Is it because it's been so normalized? White supremacists have long been hijacking Norse pagan ideology and tattoos. https://www.norwegianamerican.com/viking-symbols-stolen-racists/ https://www.folio.ca/white-supremacists-are-misappropriating-norse-mythology-says-expert/ https://pdxscholar.library.pdx.edu/cgi/viewcontent.cgi?article=1303&context=studentsymposium https://dash.harvard.edu/server/api/core/bitstreams/41f3efac-d1dd-4c1d-87e9-d105f4c7c8f5/content The douchebag in question. https://www.amazon.com/stores/author/B0F5MY2S2P/about

item.title: Another reason to love Rob Reiner
item.description: Rob Reiner was a mensch in a world where that quality is becoming harder and harder to find. He’ll be missed terribly, for many different reasons. If I achieve any type of success as a storyteller, I’d measure myself against the yardstick set by Rob Reiner. Incidentally, if you need a brief vacation from reality, all my books are free until Jan 1st on Smashwords: https://inkican.com/smashwords-white-hot-scifi-winter/ If I get to 100K given away, I can join the SFWA (Scifi Writers Association) - every click / share / review helps. <3
item.dc:creator: inkican

item.title: Return of the Meme: 1559 (trash worldbuilding)
item.description:
Let's get this bread.
Um. Something is very wrong here.
Pippin tax Today's message from Pippin: "beep. Beep?" Wanna join the discord? PM me for the link. ______ 1) Are you on the run to a safe place and passing through Arizona on your way to safer grounds? My apartment is open to you to crash at, and it is a safe space. Pippin and I will make you a meal and gladly share tea, wine, or mead with you. 2) Hey! Take your meds with a full glass of water, please. Do it for Pippin, or Space Mom, or better yet, do it for yourself. 3) Ĝefeloað wē. We will carry on. 4) all funds from the sales of items at these two links will be sent to support charities aiding to fight for Trans rights in the US (not just T-shirts!) https://www.teepublic.com/t-shirt/74812801-all-conures-are-anarchists https://www.teepublic.com/t-shirt/74811778-whiptail-pride 5) Since multiple people have requested this over the last two weeks or so, my ko-fi is: https://ko-fi.com/codyandpippin

item.title: GovBrief Today #323
item.description: The country that rebuilt Europe after WWII is now pitching condo developments on mass graves. Jared Kushner's "Project Sunrise" promises beachside resorts on Gaza's coastline. Where do 2 million displaced Palestinians go? His PowerPoint doesn't say. On Friday, we bombed Syria. The Pentagon called it a "declaration of vengeance." This year, we've also bombed Iran and Yemen without declarations of war. We've launched 28 attacks on boats, killing 104 people the Pentagon claims, without proof, were drug smugglers. And now we're copying Denmark's childhood vaccine schedule while refusing to build Denmark's universal healthcare. We want their outcomes without their commitments. The world is watching. They don't recognize us. Neither do I. Have these conversations at your holiday tables, when you gather with friends and loved ones. If they need convincing of our cruelty, a middle-aged asylum seeker remains in ICE lockup tonight despite his governor's protests. He's developmentally disabled and doesn't know he's in custody. Tell them about him. We've emailed 5,200+ stories over 323 straight nights. Stop hoping the algorithm shows them to you. govbrief.today #GovBriefToday #Resist Subscribe (It's Free!) - https://gbounacos.substack.com [1] https://go.govbrief.today/child-vaccine-schedule [2] https://go.govbrief.today/pharma-agreement-trump [3] https://go.govbrief.today/ice-disabled-man-jailed [4] https://go.govbrief.today/energy-secretary-coal-emergency [5] https://go.govbrief.today/ms-supreme-court [6] https://go.govbrief.today/nc-trump-rally-cooper [7] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-southcom-donovan [8] https://go.govbrief.today/us-attacks-syria [9] https://go.govbrief.today/comey-james-dismissal-appealed [10] https://go.govbrief.today/paxton-divorce-records [11] https://go.govbrief.today/kentucky-professor-israel-critique [12] https://go.govbrief.today/antioch-police-reforms [13] https://go.govbrief.today/epstein-files-releasing [14] https://go.govbrief.today/military-judge-fired [15] https://go.govbrief.today/father-son-deported-china [16] https://go.govbrief.today/stefanik-quits [17] https://go.govbrief.today/lummis-wyoming-senator [18] https://go.govbrief.today/duffy-tsa-incident [19] https://go.govbrief.today/kirk-vance-2028 [20] https://go.govbrief.today/gaza-sunrise-plan [21] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-billion-claim [22] https://go.govbrief.today/kennedy-center-trump-signage [23] https://go.govbrief.today/scotus-immigration-judges Subscribe (It's Free!) - https://gbounacos.substack.com
